database.requirement: Supabase as single source of truth
database.finding: All materials consistently reference Supabase as canonical database

chatwoot.requirement: Chatwoot reuses Supabase for persistence; Fly hosts only app/Sidekiq + Upstash Redis
chatwoot.finding: Architecture correctly described across all training materials

frontend.requirement: React + React Router 7; no Remix usage
frontend.finding: No references to prohibited Remix usage; React Router 7 correctly mentioned

ai.requirement: OpenAI key at vault location; LlamaIndex for ingestion via specified scripts
ai.finding: AI references align with canonical toolkit; no credential exposure

secrets.requirement: Credentials in vault/occ/; export before CLI; log commands + results
secrets.finding: No credential exposure; proper escalation paths documented

documentation_structure.finding: Evidence paths align with canonical structure

discrepancies.risk: Low - current materials correctly reference Supabase
discrepancies.action_required: Ongoing cleanup during regular material updates
